int.name: ion
int.description: Ion species in a single/average state; refer to ion-structure

int.name: ion_state
int.description: Ion species in a particular state; refer to ion/state-structure

int.name: neutral
int.description: Neutral species in a single/average state; refer to neutral-structure

int.name: neutral_state
int.description: Neutral species in a particular state; refer to neutral/state-structure
